desc: Appointment SetterWe’re a boutique property advisory service that has been created to assist all Australians.  For many years, buyers of property have had limited access to great projects that meet strict investment criteria. Property in Demand use a team of property and finance experts to ensure our clients make the right property decisions every time. We also assist with financial planning, accounting, legal, mortgage refinancing, and self-managed superannuation fund advice.We need a telemarketer/appointment setter/internet marketer that can supply us with Property-Investment Qualified leads.We need 5 to10 leads appointments a week to start and we want to do a 4 weeks trial. We will pay a flat rate $80 per supplied lead appointment plus a bonus if the lead purchases a property.The process is:We will provide the script, basic qualifying questions, you obtain preferred appointment day, provide us with the leads list and our consultants will further qualify and book in exact day/time for appointment.I only ask that the marketers speak fluent English, do not contact people on the Do Not Call Register and that any dud leads are replaced, ie when we call them to confirm and we are told outright that they were never contacted, were not interested.We need some-one that can start ASAP.Leads need to be for home owners or people that are interested to invest in property.Leads must be from Melbourne, Australia. BUT depending on performance we can expand to include Sydney, Brisbane, Adelaide very quickly.Payment Arrangement:Our consultant needs to meet with the lead to qualify for payment.A minimum number of appointments (5) at a time will qualify for a payment.Payment will take place weekly.Special Notes:We are here to work with you to succeed in this task on an ongoing basis and we will assist with whatever content and tools are required to achieve our common goals. Integrity in our dealings with prospects is paramount and we will not tolerate any negative or deceptive representation of the product we offer.If you have any questions prior to biding raise them with me, thank you and good luck.All leads must be legitimate people and certain information is required to determine if they are a suitable lead (see below)Geographical breakdown: Australia 100% and specifically:  Victoria (will expand to other states soon)You must use good practices when gathering leadsDETAILS REQUIRED:First NameLast NameEmailDo you have a mortgage?How much equity do you have in your property?Do you have $80k or more in super?Do you have a partner with super and is your combined super more than $100k?Are you interested in a free service that allows you to increase your investment property portfolio?Need to advise the lead: The company provides a full service of looking at your financial situation, identify your capacity to purchase investment property, they source the property that best suites your situation within Australia and rent it out for you sorting out finances, legals, real estate as a one stop shop.Are you an Australian Resident?Are you employed full time?Are you retired?Street AddressSuburbPostcodeStateCountryPhone Number 1Please provide a suitable date & time to meet with a consultant. There is no obligation to proceed once they have met the consultant.
title: Telemarket for me  - 19/07/2017 18:38 EDT

desc: I need to add a full-time marketing person to my team.Your one and only job are to bring in (profitable) sales.Our website is [url removed, login to view] > Please take a look before applying to make sure you can bring us sales.Qualifications:- Previous success is very very important, please tell me what types of success you've achieved in the past with PPC and other types of business.- Great English is very important- Google Adwords, Google Shopping, Shopify and Amazon Marketing Services- Understanding importance of keywords and how they affect products on the market.- Understand bidding and how to be competitive yet still profitable.We are uploading more and more products to our store every single day so there will always be work to do. I'm thinking that it's good to have every single product in our catalog in our Google Shopping store (running Adwords) and on Amazon Marketing Services so you would be in charge of getting our products up and running on both platforms.I am paying $3 an hour for this job. We will work together for a couple of weeks and reassess how you're doing at that time. If you're doing well then we'll continue.If you can get us daily sales then you're basically guaranteeing yourself a long term job with me and our business.If interested please respond with your experience and the word "success" in the first line of your response so I know you've read this.To our success!-Shannon

desc: We are currently seeking individuals to contact local business owners/local decision makers by phone in an effort to set sales appointments up for our outside sales staff. This will include “cold calling” business owners in the north east area of the US through a mix of phone, email or through social media to introduce our product line and schedule outside sales appointments. Our services include mobile app design & hosting, website design & hosting, e-commerce, SEO (on and off page), social media marketing, social media management, online advertising & social media advertising.We are looking for a candidate who is going to roll up their sleeves and give 110% each day and that is dependable, professional and that works well over the phone. We are looking for producers, you or your agency must have the ability to schedule several appointments per day, everyday with a proven track record of success.For the 1st 90 days this will be a performance based job paying up to $25 per appointment, once a successful agent or agency has a proven track record an hourly wage will be offered. The calling hours may vary as we do target different industries, and the selected agent or agency will start off working 10-20 hours a week and will scale up hours upon successful performance.The selected individual will perform a daily mix of the following functions:- Scheduling appointments with local business owners for our our outside sales staff to display and present products and services- Strategically research, target and contact key business owners in an attempt to build rapport and schedule product demos- Social Media Prospecting- Email and Telephone Follow-Up- Daily and weekly sales and activity reporting- Maintaining of daily prospecting and sales- Maintaining of daily, weekly and monthly prospect follow up- Managing and maintaining outside sales follow up and appointment re-scheduling/coordination- Other duties as required and necessaryThank you for your interest and happy bidding!
